Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Adonis Hotel Avignon Sud in Avignon, you'll be convenient to Collection Lambert and Place de l'Horloge. This hotel is within close proximity of Musee Calvet and Avignon Cathedral.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 105 air-conditioned rooms featuring plasma televisions. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have bathtubs and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreation amenities such as a seasonal outdoor pool or take in the view from a terrace.

Dining
Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a computer station, dry cleaning/laundry services, and multilingual staff. Planning an event in Avignon? This hotel has facilities measuring 1679 square feet (156 square meters), including conference space. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Enjoy recreation amenities such as a seasonal outdoor pool or take in the view from a terrace.

With a stay at Adonis Hotel Avignon Sud in Avignon, you'll be convenient to Collection Lambert and Place de l'Horloge. This hotel is within close proximity of Musee Calvet and Avignon Cathedral.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Place de l'Horloge - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Musee Calvet - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi

Fort St-Andre - 4.4 km / 2.7 mi
Chartreuse du Val de Benediction - 4.6 km / 2.9 mi
Grand Avignon Golf - 5.5 km / 3.4 mi

The nearest airports are:
Avignon (XZN-Avignon TGV Train Station) - 3.8 km / 2.3 mi
Avignon (AVN-Caumont) - 6.2 km / 3.9 mi
Marseille (MRS-Marseille - Provence) - 63 km / 39.1 mi

The preferred airport for Adonis Hotel Avignon Sud is Marseille (MRS-Marseille - Provence).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for All Seasons Avignon Sud is Montpellier (MPL-Montpellier - Mediterranean) - 80.3 km / 49.9 mi.
